p: The maximum percentage of edema inhibition by all doses of the extract was observed at the 4 th time of observation with the respective values of 54.65%, 61.54% and 70.00%. These effects verified that the extractâ€™s anti-inflammatory effect was in dose dependent manner. Edema inhibition potential showed by the higher dose of the extract (400 mg/kg) was comparable with that of the standard drug (Indomethacin 25mg/kg) with the respective values of 70.00% and 71.54% at the 4 th time of observation.
